metadata.title: CVE-2017-0374 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: lib/Config/Model.pm in Config-Model (aka libconfig-model-perl) before 2.102allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted model in the currentworking directory, related to use of . with the INC array.

criterions.comment: libconfig-model-perl package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
